By then Selina had trouble hiding her growing appetite just as she had trouble covering up her sagging paunch. She purred with every bite and her clothes continued to grow tighter.

Over at one end you spot Chun-Li and Zangief conversing taking a break from their jobs at Street Fighter II while at the other end Sonic and Tapper are playing an old-fashioned game of Spades.

“I-I need to sit down…” you mutter as your knees buckle and the world suddenly tilts until a pair of arms catch you. “Woah, easy their soldier. I take it your new here.” The beautiful blonde headed Sergeant Calhoun fills your eyesight. Her bright smile, short cut blonde hair, and immediate strong sense of character leave you breathless.

Then you panic, you jump from her arms and almost land flat on your face. After a second to steady yourself you finally speak, “So, so sorry! I am new here. It’s just, uh, a lot to take in.” You quickly take in the fact that Calhoun stands a good four heads taller than you. “Ah, don’t worry about it. I’m still star-studded myself, the name Sergeant Calhoun of Hero’s Duty.” She extends her hand out with a surely smile. Her grip is extremely firm thanks to the form fitting power suit she’s wearing, “So. What game do you come from?”

You gulp, then shift your eyes nervously, “Erm, I…I come from the new photobooth that was plugged in a month ago. I’m just a little shy I, uh, had to work up the courage to step out.”

Calhoun placed a hand on her hip, “You don’t say. Well, don’t worry. My game is done for the night so I’ll be able to give you a tour to any game you want. Just name it and we’ll be there.”

You still couldn’t believe it, “Really? You’ll do that for me.”

“Hey. It’s a Hero’s Duty to help out others.”

“Well in that case. I always wanted to check out…”
